profile.name: Fardin Iqbal
profile.tagline: Cybersecurity Intern @ NYCHA | Open to Summer 2026 Internships
bio: Computer Science student at Stony Brook University gaining hands-on cybersecurity experience at the New York City Housing Authority (NYCHA). Contributing to threat detection, incident response, and vulnerability management using Splunk and CrowdStrike Falcon.

Previously automated BIM workflows at Beyer Blinder Belle using Python, and have a strong foundation in full-stack development spanning from low-level systems programming in C to modern web frameworks like React and Ruby on Rails.

Currently seeking 2026 internships in software or security engineering to drive impactful solutions. When I'm not coding, you'll find me coaching Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu at Stony Brook or exploring the intersection of AI and software engineering.
